translation: Among the great sages, I am Bhrigu; among words, I am the one syllable (Om); among sacrifices, I am the sacrifice of silent repetition; among the immovable things, I am the Himalayas.
commentary: 10.25 among the great Rishis? Bhrigu: Bhrigu? I'm I? Giram among words? I am (I) am? Aikam the one? letter syllable? Yajnanam among sacrifices? Japayajnah the sacrifice of silent repetition? I am (I) am? among immovable things? Himalayas Himalayas.Commentary Manu has said Whatever else the Brahmana may or may not do? he attains salvation by Japa (silent repetition of a Mantra)
